text: Gustavo Enrique Giordano Amaro Assunção da Silva (born 20 March 2000), known as Gustavo Assunção, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for the club Famalicão in the Primeira Liga. ==Professional career== On 1 July 2019, Assunção signed his first professional contract with F.C. Famalicão. Assunção made his professional debut with Famalicão in a 2-0 Taça da Liga loss to S.C. Covilhã on 3 August 2019. ==International career== Born in Brazil, Assunção spent his youth in Portugal and Spain and holds passports to all three countries. He was called up to the Brazil national under-17 football team in 2016. ==Personal life== Assunção is the son of the Brazilian retired footballer Paulo Assunção. His maternal grandfather was born in Pombal, Portugal, and through him Assunção holds Portuguese citizenship. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazil youth international footballers Category:Brazilian people of Portuguese descent Category:F.C. Famalicão players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
title: Gustavo Assunção
